sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资出库信息主表id，通过出库单号
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT id FROM jy_storehouse_out WHERE putout_code =$S{putout_code};

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资出库信息主表
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t1.id, t1.putout_code, t1.putout_type, t1.putout_user, u2.`name` putout_user_name, t1.putout_date, t1.putout_storehouse_code, p1.param_name putout_storehouse_name, t1.apply_user, u1.`name` apply_user_name, t1.putin_storehouse_code, p2.param_name putin_storehouse_name, t1.`status`, t1.remark, t1.inputuser, t1.crt_date, t1.crt_time FROM jy_storehouse_out t1 LEFT JOIN jy_user u1 ON t1.apply_user = u1.id LEFT JOIN jy_user u2 ON t1.putout_user = u2.id LEFT JOIN jy_params p1 ON t1.putout_storehouse_code = p1.param_code LEFT JOIN jy_params p2 ON t1.putin_storehouse_code = p2.param_code WHERE ( t1.putout_user = $N{sys_user_id} ) AND ( t1.putout_type = $N{putout_type} ) AND ( $ISNULL{putout_code} OR t1.putout_code = $S{putout_code} ) AND ( $ISNULL{id} OR t1.id = $N{id} )

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资出库明细信息
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t1.jy_storehouse_out_id, t1.jy_material_id, t1.putout_number, t2.`code` material_code, t2.`name` material_name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` material_type_name FROM jy_storehouse_out_detail t1 LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id WHERE t1.jy_storehouse_out_id = $N{id};

INSERT INTO jy_storehouse_out ( putout_code, putout_type, putout_user, putout_date, putout_storehouse_code, apply_user, putin_storehouse_code, status, remark, inputuser, crt_date, crt_time ) VALUES ( $S{putout_code}, $N{putout_type}, $N{putout_user}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{putout_storehouse_code}, $N{apply_user}, $S{putin_storehouse_code}, $N{status}, $S{remark}, $N{sys_user_id}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{SYSTIME} );
